5008.name: Unknown
5008.message:
You cannot post to Miiverse using
this Nintendo Network ID.

For details, please start Miiverse.
5008.short_description: Your PNID has been restricted from Juxtaposition
5008.long_description:
Your Pretendo Network ID has been restricted from Juxtaposition.

This typically occurs because of a violation of the Code of Conduct, or other offenses on the Network or the Discord server.
5008.short_solution: Don't do whatever you did to get restricted.
5008.long_solution: For more information, launch the Miiverse app, or request to speak to a moderator in the [Discord server](https://discord.gg/pretendo).
